meanings.definition: Relating to the theory that myths are based on historical events.

meanings.sent2: Her euhemeristic interpretation of the legend shed light on its origins.
meanings.sent3: The euhemeristic twist in the tale made everyone chuckle.

meanings.sent2: The book offered an euhemeristic perspective on legendary figures.

meanings.definition: Involving the belief that gods were once mortal beings.
meanings.sent1: The euhemeristic notion of deities as former humans fascinated the scholars.
meanings.sent2: His euhemeristic theory challenged traditional views on divine beings.
meanings.sent3: The euhemeristic concept of gods as ex-mortal stirred up lively debates.
